name: King Roedran Almaric do Arreloa a'Naloy

chapters.title: Chapter 18:  A Peculiar Calling
chapters.info: King Roedran Almaric do Arreloa a'Naloy, p. 366 (414)—King of Murandy, at least in name. In reality, Murandians hold allegiance to lords only, and those lords often refuse to pay their taxes to the King. He hopes to make himself the first true king of Murandy in its history.
